abstract: The donation was made by Donald T. Bollinger Jr., known as Boysie, a longtime supporter of the museum, and will be used, in part, to add a 150-foot-tall “Canopy of Peace.”

headline.main: $20 Million Gift to Expand National World War II Museum

snippet: The donation was made by Donald T. Bollinger Jr., known as Boysie, a longtime supporter of the museum, and will be used, in part, to add a 150-foot-tall “Canopy of Peace.”

keywords.value: National World War II Museum (New Orleans, La)
